text: Once, at the crossroads of a road, a poor poet met a rich stupid, and they talked. And everything they said revealed their discontent. Then the Angel of the Way came and laid his hand on the shoulders of the two men. And believe it, a miracle happened; they exchanged possessions. And they walked away. But, something difficult to tell, the Poet looked and found only dry sand in his hands; and the Fool closed his eyes and felt nothing but clouds in his heart. FIN
title: El trueque
author: Gibrán Jalil Gibrán
